msItem.title: Jawami' al-Hikayat wa Lawami' al-Riwayat. Part only.
msItem.note: F1a: a) Signature: ... ham 18th August 1811 b) Stamp, the name and date in ink: Presented to the ROYAL ASIATIC SOCIETY by Lieut Colonel C.J. Doyle 15th of March 1834. F1b: Ex libris C.J. Doyle A.D. 1820. Contains parts of the first and second Qisms of the work. In the manuscript the title is given as Jami' al-Hikayat. Headings and punctuation in red. On blue paper.

listBibl.bibl: Ethe, No 600. Cf. Storey, I, ii, pp. 781-4.
Entered in the Donations Register for 15 March 1834. No 15 in list of Persian MSS.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
